articles.author: Aadya+Jha
articles.title: 8 best ways to cope with stress - The Times of India
articles.description: Managing stress is essential for maintaining a healthy and balanced life. By adding these techniques into your routine, you can reduce stress and improve your overall well-being.
articles.content: Eating a healthy, balanced diet can also help manage stress. Nutrients like omega-3 fatty acids, found in fish, and antioxidants, found in fruits and vegetables, can help regulate stress.
